landing.title: SFDA Regulatory Compliance Assistant
landing.subtitle: Your intelligent assistant for navigating Saudi Food & Drug Authority regulations and compliance requirements

chatCard.title: Chat Assistant
chatCard.description: Ask questions about SFDA regulations, variation requirements, and compliance guidelines. Get instant, accurate answers based on official documentation.

complianceCard.title: Compliance Evaluation
complianceCard.description: Upload your documentation and receive a comprehensive compliance evaluation. Our AI agents analyze your documents against SFDA requirements and provide detailed gap analysis.

landing.footer: Based on SFDA Guidelines for Variation Requirements Version 6.3

welcome.title: Welcome to SFDA Chat Assistant
welcome.subtitle: Ask me anything about SFDA variation requirements, regulatory compliance, and documentation guidelines.

suggestions.q1: What are the different types of variations?
suggestions.q2: What documentation is required for Type IA variations?
suggestions.q3: Explain the difference between Type IB and Type II variations
suggestions.q4: What are the conditions for administrative changes?

errors.generic: Sorry, there was an error processing your request.
errors.lastMessageMustBeUser: Last message must be from user
errors.processingError: An error occurred while processing your request

evaluate.title: Compliance Evaluation
evaluate.subtitle: Upload your variation submission document for comprehensive SFDA compliance analysis

upload.title: Upload Document
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your PDF here, or click to browse

errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Only PDF files are accepted.
errors.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
